bug.author: cheyang
bug.summary: Worker failed to close block reader due to Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body on cold read
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: What version of Alluxio are you using? 2.1.0-snaphost Describe the bug Running Distributed TensorFlow (4 workers) training on alluxio fuse, and the data is stored in OSS, no data in alluxio at the first.
The tensorflow training is failed due to failed to read the data: /data/imagenet/train-00464-of-01024
<denchmark-code>10 images/sec: 189.4 +/- 14.3 (jitter = 20.6) 10.731 10 images/sec: 195.6 +/- 13.2 (jitter = 20.9) 9.219 10 images/sec: 195.6 +/- 13.2 (jitter = 20.8) 13.262 10 images/sec: 189.5 +/- 14.3 (jitter = 20.4) 10.236 I1008 09:37:22.397283 139885269550848 coordinator.py:224] Error reported to Coordinator: <class 'tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.UnknownError'>, /data/imagenet/train-00464-of-01024; Input/output error [[{{node MultiDeviceIteratorGetNextFromShard}}]] [[{{node RemoteCall}}]] [[node input_processing/IteratorGetNext (defined at /perseus-demo/tensorflow-demo/benchmarks/scripts/tf_cnn_benchmarks/benchmark_cnn.py:2697) ]] [[{{node cluster_56_1/merge_oidx_273}}]] </denchmark-code>
Check the alluxio fuse logs in node 192.168.0.117, looks like it failed to get block id
<denchmark-code>2019-10-08 09:37:18,488 WARN GrpcBlockingStream - Received error io.grpc.StatusRuntimeException: UNKNOWN: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 151474249; received: 26878828 for stream (GrpcDataReader{request=block_id: 7801405440 offset: 0 length: 151474249 promote: true chunk_size: 1048576 open_ufs_block_options { ufs_path: "oss://imagenet-huabei5/images/train-00464-of-01024" offset_in_file: 0 block_size: 151474249 maxUfsReadConcurrency: 2147483647 mountId: 228572097505313622 no_cache: false } , address=WorkerNetAddress{host=192.168.0.117, rpcPort=29999, dataPort=29999, webPort=30000, domainSocketPath=, tieredIdentity=TieredIdentity(node=192.168.0.117, rack=null)}}) 2019-10-08 09:37:18,910 ERROR AlluxioFuseFileSystem - Failed to read file /training-data/images/train-00464-of-01024 alluxio.exception.status.UnknownException: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 151474249; received: 26878828 (GrpcDataReader{request=block_id: 7801405440 offset: 0 length: 151474249 promote: true chunk_size: 1048576 open_ufs_block_options { ufs_path: "oss://imagenet-huabei5/images/train-00464-of-01024" offset_in_file: 0 block_size: 151474249 maxUfsReadConcurrency: 2147483647 mountId: 228572097505313622 no_cache: false } , address=WorkerNetAddress{host=192.168.0.117, rpcPort=29999, dataPort=29999, webPort=30000, domainSocketPath=, tieredIdentity=TieredIdentity(node=192.168.0.117, rack=null)}}) at alluxio.exception.status.AlluxioStatusException.from(AlluxioStatusException.java:154) at alluxio.client.block.stream.GrpcBlockingStream.toAlluxioStatusException(GrpcBlockingStream.java:263) at alluxio.client.block.stream.GrpcBlockingStream.checkError(GrpcBlockingStream.java:244) at alluxio.client.block.stream.GrpcBlockingStream.receive(GrpcBlockingStream.java:162) at alluxio.client.block.stream.GrpcDataMessageBlockingStream.receiveDataMessage(GrpcDataMessageBlockingStream.java:84) at alluxio.client.block.stream.GrpcDataReader.readChunk(GrpcDataReader.java:120) at alluxio.client.block.stream.BlockInStream.readChunk(BlockInStream.java:375) at alluxio.client.block.stream.BlockInStream.read(BlockInStream.java:253) at alluxio.client.file.FileInStream.read(FileInStream.java:183) at alluxio.fuse.AlluxioFuseFileSystem.read(AlluxioFuseFileSystem.java:589) at ru.serce.jnrfuse.AbstractFuseFS.lambda$init$3(AbstractFuseFS.java:134) at jnr.ffi.provider.jffi.NativeClosureProxy$$impl$$9.invoke(Unknown Source) Caused by: io.grpc.StatusRuntimeException: UNKNOWN: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 151474249; received: 26878828 at io.grpc.Status.asRuntimeException(Status.java:530) at io.grpc.stub.ClientCalls$StreamObserverToCallListenerAdapter.onClose(ClientCalls.java:434) at io.grpc.PartialForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(PartialForwardingClientCallListener.java:39) at io.grpc.ForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(ForwardingClientCallListener.java:23) at io.grpc.ForwardingClientCallListener$SimpleForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(ForwardingClientCallListener.java:40) at alluxio.grpc.GrpcChannel$ChannelResponseTracker$1$1.onClose(GrpcChannel.java:168) at io.grpc.PartialForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(PartialForwardingClientCallListener.java:39) at io.grpc.ForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(ForwardingClientCallListener.java:23) at io.grpc.ForwardingClientCallListener$SimpleForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(ForwardingClientCallListener.java:40) at io.grpc.PartialForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(PartialForwardingClientCallListener.java:39) at io.grpc.ForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(ForwardingClientCallListener.java:23) at io.grpc.ForwardingClientCallListener$SimpleForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(ForwardingClientCallListener.java:40) at io.grpc.internal.CensusStatsModule$StatsClientInterceptor$1$1.onClose(CensusStatsModule.java:694) at io.grpc.PartialForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(PartialForwardingClientCallListener.java:39) at io.grpc.ForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(ForwardingClientCallListener.java:23) at io.grpc.ForwardingClientCallListener$SimpleForwardingClientCallListener.onClose(ForwardingClientCallListener.java:40) at io.grpc.internal.CensusTracingModule$TracingClientInterceptor$1$1.onClose(CensusTracingModule.java:397) at io.grpc.internal.ClientCallImpl.closeObserver(ClientCallImpl.java:459) at io.grpc.internal.ClientCallImpl.access$300(ClientCallImpl.java:63) at io.grpc.internal.ClientCallImpl$ClientStreamListenerImpl.close(ClientCallImpl.java:546) at io.grpc.internal.ClientCallImpl$ClientStreamListenerImpl.access$600(ClientCallImpl.java:467) at io.grpc.internal.ClientCallImpl$ClientStreamListenerImpl$1StreamClosed.runInContext(ClientCallImpl.java:584) at io.grpc.internal.ContextRunnable.run(ContextRunnable.java:37) at io.grpc.internal.SerializingExecutor.run(SerializingExecutor.java:123) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1149) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:624) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) alluxio.exception.status.UnknownException: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 151474249; received: 26878828 (GrpcDataReader{request=block_id: 7801405440 </denchmark-code>
The details log <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/files/3702233/alluxio-fuse-7m2gc-alluxio-fuse.log>alluxio-fuse-7m2gc-alluxio-fuse.log</denchmark-link>
I see a lot of the errors in worker logs( 192.168.0.117)
<denchmark-code>2019-10-08 09:37:42,724 WARN BlockReadHandler - Failed to close block reader for block 3607101440 with error Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 148811335; received: 36211319. 2019-10-08 09:37:42,754 WARN BlockReadHandler - Failed to close block reader for block 12197036032 with error Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 152391087; received: 35165166. 2019-10-08 09:37:42,779 WARN BlockReadHandler - Failed to close block reader for block 6660554752 with error Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 141589159; received: 36231221. 2019-10-08 09:37:42,800 WARN BlockReadHandler - Failed to close block reader for block 4966055936 with error Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 140042540; received: 36096377. </denchmark-code>
See the details in the logs: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/files/3702329/alluxio-worker-9nhmp-alluxio-worker.log>alluxio-worker-9nhmp-alluxio-worker.log</denchmark-link>
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible) Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Urgency Describe the impact and urgency of the bug. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cheyang>@cheyang</denchmark-link> I did some initial investigation. It seems a HTTP response to Alluxio worker from the UFS service (OSS in this case), that the server claimed that the content contained X bytes but only sent Y (<X) bytes. If this is the case, the root cause is below Alluxio layer but either in the UFS connector or the UFS service <denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/23152816/premature-end-of-content-length-delimited-message-body-expected>https://stackoverflow.com/questions/23152816/premature-end-of-content-length-delimited-message-body-expected</denchmark-link>

I'm able to reproduce the issue even setting the block size to 32MB:
I can see the problem block id (which is in 192.168.0.117 )is 7801405440 (expected: 33554432; received: 27767820)
<denchmark-code>ed: 27767820 for stream (GrpcDataReader{request=block_id: 7801405440 offset: 0 length: 33554432 promote: true chunk_size: 1048576 open_ufs_block_options { ufs_path: "oss://imagenet-huabei5/images/train-00464-of-01024" offset_in_file: 0 block_size: 33554432 maxUfsReadConcurrency: 2147483647 mountId: 4770954595713637123 no_cache: false } , address=WorkerNetAddress{host=192.168.0.117, rpcPort=29999, dataPort=29999, webPort=30000, domainSocketPath=, tieredIdentity=TieredIdentity(node=192.168.0.117, rack=null)}}) 2019-10-10 16:58:42,487 ERROR AlluxioFuseFileSystem - Failed to read file /training-data/images/train-00464-of-01024 alluxio.exception.status.UnknownException: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 27767820 (GrpcDataReader{request=block_id: 7801405440 offset: 0 length: 33554432 promote: true chunk_size: 1048576 open_ufs_block_options { ufs_path: "oss://imagenet-huabei5/images/train-00464-of-01024" offset_in_file: 0 block_size: 33554432 maxUfsReadConcurrency: 2147483647 mountId: 4770954595713637123 no_cache: false } </denchmark-code>
2.Check the workers(117) log, Seems it retries several times <denchmark-code>2019-10-10 16:58:40,875 WARN AbstractReadHandler - Exception occurred while reading data for read request alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadRequest@43ab79ca.: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 27767820 2019-10-10 16:58:42,448 WARN AbstractReadHandler - Exception occurred while reading data for read request alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadRequest@487ea43c.: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 27420018 2019-10-10 16:58:42,471 WARN AbstractReadHandler - Exception occurred while reading data for read request alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadRequest@1d6d253d.: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 27602194 2019-10-10 16:58:42,933 WARN AbstractReadHandler - Exception occurred while reading data for read request alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadRequest@33dd5b40.: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 27455824 Oct 10, 2019 4:58:46 PM io.grpc.netty.NettyServerHandler onStreamError </denchmark-code>
I went to the machine 192.168.0.117, check the length of the block 7801405440, its size is 33554432 which is the same as expected.
<denchmark-code>[root@iZhp3b4qysu7phen3sah9sZ ~]# cd /dev/shm/alluxioworker/ [root@iZhp3b4qysu7phen3sah9sZ alluxioworker]# ls -ltr |grep 7801405440 -rwxrwxrwx 1 root root 33554432 Oct 11 00:58 7801405440 </denchmark-code>

I'm able to see such error: <denchmark-code>2019-10-12 07:50:17,413 WARN BlockReadHandler - Failed to close block reader for block 12062818304 with error. org.apache.http.ConnectionClosedException: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 27506068 at org.apache.http.impl.io.ContentLengthInputStream.read(ContentLengthInputStream.java:178) at org.apache.http.impl.io.ContentLengthInputStream.read(ContentLengthInputStream.java:198) at org.apache.http.impl.io.ContentLengthInputStream.close(ContentLengthInputStream.java:101) at org.apache.http.conn.BasicManagedEntity.streamClosed(BasicManagedEntity.java:166) at org.apache.http.conn.EofSensorInputStream.checkClose(EofSensorInputStream.java:228) at org.apache.http.conn.EofSensorInputStream.close(EofSensorInputStream.java:172) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.close(BufferedInputStream.java:483) at alluxio.underfs.MultiRangeObjectInputStream.closeStream(MultiRangeObjectInputStream.java:115) at alluxio.underfs.MultiRangeObjectInputStream.close(MultiRangeObjectInputStream.java:53) at alluxio.worker.block.UfsInputStreamManager.release(UfsInputStreamManager.java:137) at alluxio.worker.block.UnderFileSystemBlockReader.close(UnderFileSystemBlockReader.java:263) at alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadHandler$BlockDataReader.completeRequest(BlockReadHandler.java:88) at alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadHandler$BlockDataReader.completeRequest(BlockReadHandler.java:70) at alluxio.worker.grpc.AbstractReadHandler$DataReader.runInternal(AbstractReadHandler.java:385) at alluxio.worker.grpc.AbstractReadHandler$DataReader.run(AbstractReadHandler.java:293) at alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadHandler$BlockDataReader.run(BlockReadHandler.java:70) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266) at alluxio.worker.grpc.GrpcExecutors$ImpersonateThreadPoolExecutor.lambda$execute$0(GrpcExecutors.java:82) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1149) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:624) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) </denchmark-code>
Then go to the master: <denchmark-code> alluxio fsadmin getBlockInfo 12062818304 BlockInfo{id=12062818304, length=33554432, locations=[BlockLocation{workerId=4908652696890144149, address=WorkerNetAddress{host=192.168.0.195, rpcPort=29999, dataPort=29999, webPort=30000, domainSocketPath=, tieredIdentity=TieredIdentity(node=192.168.0.195, rack=null)}, tierAlias=MEM, mediumType=MEM}]} This block belongs to file {id=12079595519, path=/images/train-00718-of-01024} </denchmark-code>
And check the block id 12062818304 in the worker which is in 192.168.0.195. The block size is also 33554432. <denchmark-code>[root@iZhp309790vg0alb65q1e9Z ~]# kubectl get po -owide |grep alluxio|grep worker|grep -v job|grep 192.168.0.195 alluxio-worker-4zm6r 2/2 Running 0 39m 192.168.0.195 cn-huhehaote.i-hp32to8ln1xdug4rk402 <none> [root@iZhp309790vg0alb65q1e9Z ~]# kubectl exec -it alluxio-worker-4zm6r bash Defaulting container name to alluxio-worker. Use 'kubectl describe pod/alluxio-worker-4zm6r -n default' to see all of the containers in this pod. bash-4.4# ls -ltr /dev/shm/alluxioworker/12062818304 -rwxrwxrwx 1 root root 33554432 Oct 12 07:49 /dev/shm/alluxioworker/12062818304 </denchmark-code>

But I think the real Error which causes the read failed is <denchmark-code>2019-10-12 07:50:13,695 ERROR AlluxioFuseFileSystem - Failed to read file /images/train-00233-of-01024 alluxio.exception.status.UnknownException: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 27393063 (GrpcDataReader{request=block_id: 3925868544 offset: 0 length: 33554432 promote: true chunk_size: 1048576 open_ufs_block_options { ufs_path: "oss://imagenet-huabei5/images/train-00233-of-01024" offset_in_file: 0 block_size: 33554432 maxUfsReadConcurrency: 2147483647 mountId: 1 no_cache: false } , address=WorkerNetAddress{host=192.168.0.195, rpcPort=29999, dataPort=29999, webPort=30000, domainSocketPath=, tieredIdentity=TieredIdentity(node=192.168.0.195, rack=null)}}) at alluxio.exception.status.AlluxioStatusException.from(AlluxioStatusException.java:154) at alluxio.client.block.stream.GrpcBlockingStream.toAlluxioStatusException(GrpcBlockingStream.java:263) at alluxio.client.block.stream.GrpcBlockingStream.checkError(GrpcBlockingStream.java:244) at alluxio.client.block.stream.GrpcBlockingStream.receive(GrpcBlockingStream.java:162) </denchmark-code>
And the related error is in alluxio-worker-4zm6r-alluxio-worker.log. <denchmark-code>2019-10-12 07:50:11,160 WARN AbstractReadHandler - Exception occurred while reading data for read request alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadRequest@cba1b70.: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 27393063 </denchmark-code>

I'm trying to upgrade aliyun OSS to 3.6.0, and test again. <denchmark-code>org.apache.http.ConnectionClosedException: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 26980384 at org.apache.http.impl.io.ContentLengthInputStream.read(ContentLengthInputStream.java:178) at org.apache.http.conn.EofSensorInputStream.read(EofSensorInputStream.java:135) at java.util.zip.CheckedInputStream.read(CheckedInputStream.java:82) at java.io.FilterInputStream.read(FilterInputStream.java:133) at com.aliyun.oss.event.ProgressInputStream.read(ProgressInputStream.java:118) at java.util.zip.CheckedInputStream.read(CheckedInputStream.java:82) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read1(BufferedInputStream.java:284) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(BufferedInputStream.java:345) at alluxio.underfs.MultiRangeObjectInputStream.read(MultiRangeObjectInputStream.java:80) at io.netty.buffer.UnsafeByteBufUtil.setBytes(UnsafeByteBufUtil.java:454) at io.netty.buffer.PooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf.setBytes(PooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf.java:278) at io.netty.buffer.AbstractByteBuf.writeBytes(AbstractByteBuf.java:1118) at alluxio.worker.block.UnderFileSystemBlockReader.transferTo(UnderFileSystemBlockReader.java:223) at alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadHandler$BlockDataReader.getDataBuffer(BlockReadHandler.java:110) at alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadHandler$BlockDataReader.getDataBuffer(BlockReadHandler.java:70) at alluxio.worker.grpc.AbstractReadHandler$DataReader.runInternal(AbstractReadHandler.java:325) at alluxio.worker.grpc.AbstractReadHandler$DataReader.run(AbstractReadHandler.java:293) at alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadHandler$BlockDataReader.run(BlockReadHandler.java:70) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266) at alluxio.worker.grpc.GrpcExecutors$ImpersonateThreadPoolExecutor.lambda$execute$0(GrpcExecutors.java:82) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1149) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:624) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) </denchmark-code>
And also see similar issue: <denchmark-link:https://discuss.hail.is/t/i-am-trying-to-import-vcf-but-i-receive-an-error-connectionclosedexception-premature-end-of-content-length-delimited-message-body/1051/2>https://discuss.hail.is/t/i-am-trying-to-import-vcf-but-i-receive-an-error-connectionclosedexception-premature-end-of-content-length-delimited-message-body/1051/2</denchmark-link>
Any hints? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apc999>@apc999</denchmark-link>

The build I tested is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/10049>#10049</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>[INFO] +- com.aliyun.oss:aliyun-sdk-oss:jar:3.6.0:compile [INFO] | +- org.apache.httpcomponents:httpclient:jar:4.5.3:compile [INFO] | | +- org.apache.httpcomponents:httpcore:jar:4.4.6:compile [INFO] | | \- commons-logging:commons-logging:jar:1.1.1:compile [INFO] | +- org.jdom:jdom:jar:1.1:compile [INFO] | +- org.codehaus.jettison:jettison:jar:1.1:compile [INFO] | | \- stax:stax-api:jar:1.0.1:compile [INFO] | +- com.aliyun:aliyun-java-sdk-core:jar:3.4.0:compile [INFO] | +- com.aliyun:aliyun-java-sdk-ram:jar:3.0.0:compile [INFO] | +- com.aliyun:aliyun-java-sdk-sts:jar:3.0.0:compile [INFO] | \- com.aliyun:aliyun-java-sdk-ecs:jar:4.2.0:compile
</denchmark-code>

I tried to add some debug info like: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cheyang/alluxio/commit/14e72173e567a966095af0cfb00060d1f27376f9>cheyang@14e7217</denchmark-link>
And I found it seems not took too much time: <denchmark-code>2019-10-14 02:08:26,265 WARN AbstractReadHandler - Exception occurred while reading data for read request alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadRequest@6a30091f, and it took 15 ms 2019-10-14 02:08:26,266 WARN AbstractReadHandler - Exception occurred while reading data for read request alluxio.worker.grpc.BlockReadRequest@6a30091f. org.apache.http.ConnectionClosedException: Premature end of Content-Length delimited message body (expected: 33554432; received: 31451830 at org.apache.http.impl.io.ContentLengthInputStream.read(ContentLengthInputStream.java:178) at org.apache.http.conn.EofSensorInputStream.read(EofSensorInputStream.java:135) at java.util.zip.CheckedInputStream.read(CheckedInputStream.java:82) at java.io.FilterInputStream.read(FilterInputStream.java:133) at com.aliyun.oss.event.ProgressInputStream.read(ProgressInputStream.java:118) at java.util.zip.CheckedInputStream.read(CheckedInputStream.java:82) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.fill(BufferedInputStream.java:246) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read1(BufferedInputStream.java:286) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(BufferedInputStream.java:345) </denchmark-code>
